did.unittitle: Indiana University literary society student ledger
did.abstract: Literary societies cropped up early on American college and university campuses, and were one of the few social outlets available to students. This collection consists entirely of a ledger signed by students vowing to follow the rules and regulations of the Indiana University Trustees and their respective literary societies.

accessrestrict.head: Access Restrictions
accessrestrict.p: Collection is open for research. Advance notice required.

bioghist.head: Administrative History
bioghist.p: Literary societies cropped up early on American college and university campuses, and were one of the few social outlets available to students. At Indiana University, the two main literaries were the Athenian and Philomathean, established in 1830 and 1831, respectively.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: Collection consists of a single ledger.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Note
scopecontent.p: This collection consists entirely of a single ledger with signatures from campus literary society members spanning 1864-1875. On the top of each page is written: "We whose names are hereunto subscribed, pledge ourselves to submit, both as students and as members of the literary societies, to all the rules and regulations of the board of trustees, as long as we remain members of the Institution." Each entry includes the student's name, hometown, and name of their parent or guardian.

relatedmaterial.head: Related Material
relatedmaterial.p: The Archives holds records from most of the literary societies that existed on campus during the years this ledger was in use. Finding aids for those records are available on Archives Online.

userestrict.head: Usage Restrictions
userestrict.p: Collection is in the public domain. For more information, please contact the Indiana University Archives staff.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: [Item], Indiana University literary society student ledger, Collection C663, Indiana University Archives, Bloomington.

custodhist.head: Provenance
custodhist.p: Transferred to the Indiana University Archives at a unknown date.

did.unittitle: Indiana University literary society student ledger
